item.description:
At last night's meeting we decided that we all had lots of unused parts lying around, so we decided to create a swap meet. There is no fee to bring stuff, and no fee to attend. Just pile your unwanted electronic project parts into a box and bring it by for sale or barter.

 

I've scheduled this for a Sunday morning, and will be bringing bagels. The date is set for November, 6--save the date!

 

We can move this to a more convenient location if someone comes up with one. Otherwise, it will be held at Sixsmith.
item.how_to_find_us: The farmstand at the top of the hill.
item.name: Robot Parts Swap Meet
